net.sf.morph
Class Defaults

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.morph.Defaults

public abstract class Defaults
extends java.lang.Object

Default instances of the main objects that are used repeatedly in the framework.

Since:
Jan 9, 2005
Author:
Matt Sgarlata
